name: Outer Worlds (Azee)
description:
Let your creativity take over and create some amazing/bizarre looking worlds and share them with your friends, and see who can get the fastest time in the Time Trials while flying through these worlds.
NOTE: I've attached some of the worlds I created at the bottom of this page if you want to check them out.
Creating and Exporting a world:
Start off by generating a random world using the Procedural world generator.Edit the generated world to your liking using the "Terrain Tool". Get Creative!!Place checkpoints around the world using the "Checkpoint Tool" for Time Trials.You can also edit/move/remove the checkpoints, insert new ones in the middle, set it to loop, reverse directions, etc..Once you're done, Save the world and share the exported file with your friends. Note: The path of the exported file will be displayed on the bottom right of the screen when you Save a world.Note: Instructions can be shown/hidden by pressing "I" on your keyboard.Note: You can switch between "Terrain Tool" and "Checkpoint Tool".Note: You can switch between "Freefly Mode" and "Drone Mode".
Importing a world:
From the World Menu, select "Load"Enter the path to the world file you want to import.Click on "Import World"You can save the imported world to make it easy to load it next time.
Playing Time Trials:
Once you have the world loaded, open the World Menu, and click on "Play".Drone Controls are in the Pause Menu
Controls (Also shown in-game):
General Controls:Move: Arrow KeysBoost: Left ShiftTurn/Look: MouseRaise/Lower: E/QToggle Tool: Tab (Only in World Editor)Toggle Fly Mode: M (Only in World Editor)Show / Hide Menu: EscapeShow / Hide Instructions: ITerrain Tool Controls:Build / Destroy: Left Click / Right ClickAdjust radius: Mouse Scroll WheelChange Terrain Color: CChange Skybox: VCheckpoint Tool Controls:Add / Remove checkpoint: Left Click / Right ClickRemove all checkpoints: DeleteMove a checkpoint: Left Click and DragMark as Starting point: HomeToggle Loop: LReverse Direction: R
